title: Spread The Word
description: The Morrigan gave me her powers...I should get used to using them
quest_step_resolution: I beginning to feel stronger! I might be able to fly solo now
Now that she's out of me, let the fun begin
I feel unstoppable! This can't be all there is though, can it?
completion_message: I will make this world mine!

title: Taking Control
description: Nemain? Badb? Just how many other gods are there!? They gave me more power, and they'll need me to beat Morrigu
quest_step_resolution: Dominating the Principal huh, let's see what this power can do
She was a tough one to crack...but nobody ever go anywhere by giving up
What a bitch! She won't be causing any more trouble now
I've basically taken over the town now...but I'm not finished yet!
Don't get cold feet now...

title: Dominion
description: It's not over yet...I will not stand for being used again!
quest_step_description: Talk to Morrigu and Get Ready
quest_step_resolution: If I am going to take them on, I need to be as strong as possible
That should do it, they better watch out
Keep calm, you can do this
I got ahead of little ahead of myself, but it worked out some how. Badb you better get ready
I'm already this far, its time to go for the gold!
completion_message: That'll teach them, that'll teach them ALL. This world is mine!

title: New World
description: I've never thought about restarting the world...can I readlly do it?
quest_step_resolution: She's broken, and her words are hollow, but they help
Take a breathe, you've done more than you've ever hoped
I've already faced death once, I need to steel myself for this
completion_message: Congrats! You win! Enjoy the the spoils!

title: Christine's Emergence
description: I've never really had a problem with her, but we could stand to be closer. Let's see how far she will go
quest_step_description: Visit the highschool on a weekday morning

Surprise 
[3] in her room in the morning

Find a way to speak to 
[3]
quest_step_resolution:
Jenny seems nice, maybe I should ask 
[3] about her

Whoa...
[3] is really into Jenny...maybe I could use this, but first I should get closer to her
I should make a copy of this
All the things I can do with this now...hehe
Well that went better than expected! Using her interest in Jenny was definitely the right call
She's pissed at me now...how do I get her to talk to me? Maybe I could...
Phew, that was a risk that was well worth it
completion_message: That's all for this version, thanks for playing!

title: Dorothy's Debauchery
description: Dorothy is the serious and strict librarian. Let's see if I can break her of that
quest_step_resolution: She's an uptight b****, but something seemed off about her...I should ask around
So thats it! Let's see if I can use what I learned to my advantage
Hmmm...maybe I can use her for something
Who should be first? Oh I know, maybe her...
Maybe I should check in on Dorothy
That was peculiar...let's do some more digging
Is that how it is? Let's not waste any time then, let's bring Dorothy her favorite pupil
completion_message: That's all for this version, thanks for playing!

title: Gaby's Greed
description: Gaby huh? After what she did, I'll make her pay.
quest_step_description: Wait some time, then lay a trap for Gaby
Go to School in the Morning
quest_step_resolution: Knowing what I do now, I should try to learn momre about her
Money huh? I have a plan
I should see how far I can push her
Hmm...let's play with her head. What is it girls her age like these days?
A phone and a purse, typical
I should get these back to Freya
I can't wait to see the look on her face
I can tell she's jealous, just have to wait for her to come crawling to me
That was fun, now let's make her desperate
Damn this stuff is expensive, I better save up if I'm going to play this right
Haha! It's all coming together. Let's see how crazy we can make her
I deserve a day of rest don't I?
Alright, let's see how she's doing
completion_message: That's all for this version, thanks for playing!

title: Jenny's Just Desserts
description: Jenny seems like a nice girl. Let's have some fun with her
quest_step_description: Talk to Jenny in the afternoon
Talk to Jenny at her school
Find a way to ensure she fails her next test
Wait until Friday afternoon and talk to Jenny
Go to Jenny's house in the evening
quest_step_resolution: This is going to be fun
I think she's ready to be pushed farther
Aww man, it's a good thing I used to study, that could have gone wrong!
This is perfect, I can keep making sure we are alone
Let's see what Jenny's up to
I should talk to her teacher
Ha you stupid b****, teaches you right to just throw me away when you don't need me anymore
Man, her Mom is pretty hot, it would be a shame if something happened ot her
completion_message: That's all for this version, thanks for playing!

title: Getting Even
description: Revenge is a dish best served on her knees. Get ready Bryce, paybacks a b****
completion_message: That's all for this version, thanks for playing!
